head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOLLOY, MARY J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOLLOY, MARY J.

block.p: MOLLOY-Mary J. Of Williston Park, NY, on September 18th, 2000. Beloved wife of the late John. Devoted mother of Anne Casper, Rosemary Molloy, John, Patrick, Stephen and the late Kevin. Loving grandmother of Matthew, Evan, Lynne and Tracey. College administrator with NYU for over 25 years. Visitation Tuesday, 7-9 PM, and Wednesday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM, at Weigand Bros. Funeral Home, 49 Hillside Ave., Williston Park. Funeral Mass on Thursday, 11:15 AM, at St. Aidan's R.C. Church. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made in Mary's memory to Covenant House, 346 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011.
